name: creacion-libreria-ui
description: Libreria UI de componentes, donde podras importar components de imagenes, texto, boton o un container

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run release
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run publish
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run publish
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production && rm -rf ./dist && mkdir dist && npx babel --config-file ./babel.config.js src/ --out-dir dist --copy-files --ignore '**/*.spec.js' --no-copy-ignored
